# dependencytrack_oidc_login (Data Source)

Authenticate using OIDC Tokens.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "dependencytrack_oidc_login" "example" {
  id_token = "eyJ..."
}

output "oidc_available" {
  value = data.dependencytrack_oidc_login.example.token
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id_token` (String, Sensitive) OIDC ID Token from Identity Provider.

### Optional

- `access_token` (String, Sensitive) OIDC Access Token from Identity Provider. Optional if all required fields are present in ID Token.

### Read-Only

- `token` (String, Sensitive) DependencyTrack bearer token.
